alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 16 at 8:37AM EST until December 17 at 12:30PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Riverview near US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. .Coastal flooding combined with heavy rainfall is expected to cause the Alafia River to rise into Moderate Flood stage which will peak Saturday night into Sunday AM. For the Alafia...including Lithia , Riverview near US 301...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Alafia River at Riverview near US 301. * WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, Water begins to impact homes on Pine Avenue and Park Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 1.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 4.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 5.0 feet late tonight. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.0 feet on 06/15/2012. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (9 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Alafia River Riverview near US 4.2 1.1 Sat 8 am 2.4 1.3 1.1 1.4 0.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 6pmthis evening by 1145 PM EST.
